channel.title: Best Resources For Adwords
channel.description:
Hi, Does anyone have any resources on Google AdWords? I've got a free voucher so might as well spend it.
I've got a few apps launching or updatingthis month (possibly) so would be nice to maybe help promote them and maximise the potential.
Thanks

item.title: Best Resources For Adwords
item.dc:creator: johnf
item.description:
I took the following course on Udemy and ran a decent campaign with what I learned. My first ever saas customer came from Adwords so that was nice.

Udemy

Online Courses - Anytime, Anywhere | Udemy

Udemy is the world's largest destination for online courses. Discover an online course on Udemy.com and start learning a new skill today.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Resources For Adwords
item.dc:creator: daverodenbaugh
item.description:
This book by Iain Dooley (not free) has been immensely helpful to me in decoding the crappy world of Google advertising.

http://www.decalmarketing.com/adwords-book/

@TheDaveCollins might also have something else he could share on this, given his inner knowledge of SEO, AdWords and Google.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Resources For Adwords
item.dc:creator: Andy
item.description:
I have written a number of articles on AdWords over the years:
http://successfulsoftware.net/category/adwords/

AdWords is complicated, with many moving parts and options. Take the time to learn how it works. I also recommend sticking to search (not display) ads to start with.

Read full topic
